channel.title: Project flagged now recruiting
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://www.marqueetextlive.com][IMG]http://img106.mytextgraphics.com/marqueetext/2007/07/30/991be3f27db2ed69d098055a01ef0fd0.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://www.matrixtext.com][IMG]http://img105.mytextgraphics.com/matrixtext/2007/07/30/8c9bf79cd39f501799c6d63019d223ad.gif[/img][/URL] By : skullieskull
im going to start my own server but i need some help Coders: skullieskull - - -
Owner/co-owner: skullieskull - - -
Admins:(ingame) (FULL SORRY) - - - -
Forum moderaters\admins skullieskull - - -
Testers: - - - -
Web client Designers - - - - -[/center]
For coder use this format : How old are you? How much exp do you have in coding? Why should i accept you? Will you be loyal? Will you break the rules?
For Co-Owner : How old are you? What will be your in game username? Will you be active? will you abuse your powers? Will you follow the rules?
For forum mod\admin: How old are you? What will be your forum user? Will you be loyal? Will you Ban everyone from the forum when i make you a mod?
For tester: How old are you? Will you Test the server and moderater the thread? Will you keep me up to date about rule breakers in-game?
For webclient designer How old are you? Will you Try your best in the webclient? Will you be a dick?
For admin. Do the same as u would be doing for co\owner
[center]Our Goals -Dds hits twice - 98% working specs Dark bow from an seercull - Dark bow hits twice and has a spec - full mining - full woodcutting - full barrows - a PK box[/center]

item.title: Project flagged now recruiting
item.dc:creator: @Gr4nny_Maul Gr4nny Maul
item.description:
@Gr4nny_Maul wrote:

How old are you? Pfft You Dont Need To Know Peoples Age -.-
How much exp do you have in coding? 1 Year Also http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,179191.0.html

Why should i accept you? Because You Should…
Will you be loyal? Yeah…
Will you break the rules? No…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

i can help u with geting the full wc and all… but i cant help you with anything else…

item.title: Project flagged now recruiting
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

[quote=“skullieskull, post:1, topic:128371”][center]

By : skullieskull

im going to start my own server but i need some help
Coders:
skullieskull

Owner/co-owner:
skullieskull

Admins:(ingame) (FULL SORRY)

Forum moderaters\admins
skullieskull

Testers:

Web client Designers

-[/center]

For coder use this format :
How old are you?
How much exp do you have in coding?
Why should i accept you?
Will you be loyal?
Will you break the rules?

For Co-Owner :
How old are you?
What will be your in game username?
Will you be active?
will you abuse your powers?
Will you follow the rules?

For forum mod\admin:
How old are you?
What will be your forum user?
Will you be loyal?
Will you Ban everyone from the forum when i make you a mod?

For tester:
How old are you?
Will you Test the server and moderater the thread?
Will you keep me up to date about rule breakers in-game?

For webclient designer
How old are you?
Will you Try your best in the webclient?
Will you be a dick?

For admin. Do the same as u would be doing for co\owner

[center]Our Goals
-Dds hits twice

  • 98% working specs
    Dark bow from an seercull
  • Dark bow hits twice and has a spec
  • full mining
  • full woodcutting
  • full barrows
  • a PK box[/center][/quote]I high doubt you cna do this with your coding level

Read full topic
